data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Pattani against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pattani, Thailand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Pattani that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 4,342 believers in Pattani, Thailand a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Pattani, Thailand need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
the state of Pattani has (about) 4,342 people who know Jesus, 4,432 people who know about him culturally, and 662,726 people who are far from Jesus.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Pattani, Thailand. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Pattani. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.
